sentences.sContent: Our hotel was in a superb central position near St Mark’s Square.
sentences.sCn: 我们的酒店处于极佳的中心位置，在圣马克广场附近。

sentences.sContent: the strategic position (= useful or important position ) of Egypt in relation to the Arabian peninsula
sentences.sCn: 埃及相对于阿拉伯半岛的战略位置

sentences.sContent: ...men use conflict as a way to position themselves...
...This difference in handling conflict could be the deciding factor on who gets promoted to a leadership position and who does not...
...Whats the woman's position in her company...
...and I'd like a full-time position with more responsibility...
...rice occupies a very important position in the Chinese diet...
...Americans have taken for granted the United States' leadership position in the development of new technologies...
...May I ask what kind of position they’ve offered you...
...I’ve been offered a much better position with another firm...
...Do not stay in one position too long...
...they can't help grabbing the lead dog position andclinging on to it for dear life...
...That position paid $90...
...but I am thankful to be in a position where I can help people overcome this struggle...
...and I’d like a full-time position with more responsibility...
...I’d like the position of sales manager if that position is still vacant...
...what position in the company appeals to you most...
...I would have automatically assumed the man was the best candidate because the position required quite a bit of extensive travel...
...I had a management position open in my department ;and the two finalists were a man and a woman...
...My reasoning would have been that even though both candidates were great and could have been successful in the position...
...who’ll become Oxford’s vice-chancellor—a position equivalent to university president in America...

phrases.pCn: 就位；在适当的位置；在原位
起始领先位置；跑道内圈
关键部位，要害部位；位置关键帧
高位，指重要位置；领导地位（身份）
目前位置，当前位置；流动财务状况
特殊位置；特殊版面；特殊版位

words.tran: 难题；装腔作势者；不易处理的事
造成，形成；摆姿势；装模作样；提出…讨论
[计] 定位（position的现在分词）；放置

trans.tranOther: the place where someone or something is, especially in relation to other objects and places
